Links to the liblouis and liblouisutdml manuals are given below. A BrailleBlaster manual will be written in time. The liblouis and liblouisutdml subdirectories of this helpDocs directory also contain text versions of the manuals. Use of the html version, as provided here, is strongly recommended, since they contain tables of contents with live links, etc. Either the html or text versions can be translated into braille and embossed by using the Translate or Emboss Now! menu items or by using the translate and/or emboss subcommands. For this, see The tutorial

  • Liblouisutdml Manual
